name: Dana Reeve, The Real Superwoman Trivia Game | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.text: Dana Morosini was born in 1961, but where was her place of birth?
questions.explanation:
New Jersey.

	Dana Morosini was born to Charles and Helen Morosini on March 17, 1961 in Teaneck, New Jersey. She was the sister of Deborah and Adrienne Morosini Heilman.

questions.text: Dana graduated with honors from Middlebury College, Vermont in 1984. What did she major in?
questions.explanation:
English Literature.

	After graduating from Middlebury College, Dana went to graduate school at the California Institute of Arts. In 2004, Dana and Chris were given Honorary Doctorates of Humane Letters from Middlebury.

questions.text: Where was Dana when she met Christopher Reeve for the first time?
questions.explanation:
Massachusetts.

	Dana was singing at the Williamstown Theatre Festival in Massachusetts when she and Chris first met. In his book, Chris said when he first saw Dana "she was wearing an off-the-shoulder dress and singing 'The music that makes me dance'."

questions.text: Why didn't Dana and Chris have a honeymoon?
questions.correct: They were both working on projects.
options: They couldn't decide on a destination.
questions.explanation:
They were both working on projects.

	Dana Morosini became Dana Reeves on April 11, 1992 during an outdoor ceremony with more than forty-five guests in attendance. They didn't have a honeymoon because both of them were working on separate projects.

questions.text: What is the name of Dana's only biological child with her husband?
questions.explanation:
Will.

	Will Reeve was born on June 7, 1992. He is the only child Dana and Chris had together. When Chris married Dana, he had a son and a daughter from another marriage.

More To Love.

	Dana made her Broadway debut in a three person play called "More To Love: A Big Fat Comedy". The show only lasted four performances and Dana said she lasted longer as a snowflake in her third grade Christmas pageant.

questions.text: Which crime show series did Dana star in as two different people?
questions.explanation:
Law and Order.

	Dana starred in two episodes of "Law and Order". In 1990, Dana starred in "By Hooker, by Crook" as Camilla and in 1997, Dana starred as Susan Tashjian in the episode "Barter". In 2001, Dana also starred in the "Law and Order: Criminal Intent" episode "The Faithful" as Melani Grasso.

questions.text: Did Dana appear as herself in the "Brook Ellison Story"?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Christopher Reeve directed the story of Brook Ellison, the first quadriplegic person to graduate Harvard. Dana appeared as Brooke's unnamed English professor.

questions.text: On which show did Dana give her first interview after her husband's death?
questions.explanation:
Oprah.

	Dana and Will Reeve gave their first interview to Oprah on February 16, 2005, four months after Christopher Reeve's death. Dana talked about leaving her Broadway play after hearing that Chris had been rushed to the hospital. Will talked about spending the last few hours of his dad's life with him.

questions.text: What did Dana Reeve succumb to on March 6, 2006?
questions.explanation:
Lung Cancer.

	After hearing that the "National Enquirer" was going to post that she had cancer, Dana announced first that she had been diagnosed with lung cancer. She died in Memorial Sloan-Kettering Medical Center in Manhattan, New York almost seven months to the day after she made the announcement of her cancer.
